subject: Re: Order #SSN2973, how did it go?
description_text:
Hi Great , works well as expected.

Regards

Geoff

On Wed, 5 Nov 2025 at 7:18 PM SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Geoff, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
